scripts.lint: cd global-compiler; npm run lint; cd ..; cd gc-cli; npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.test: cd global-compiler; npm t; cd ..; cd gc-cli; npm t
scripts.precompile: cd global-compiler; npm run precompile; cd ..; cd gc-cli; npm run precompile
scripts.compile: cd global-compiler; npm run compile; cd ..; cd gc-cli; npm run compile
